General.Name: Cosmecca Korea Co. Ltd
General.Description: Cosmecca Korea Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of cosmetics in South Korea and internationally. It offers skincare, functional, and makeup products. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Eumseong-eup, South Korea.
